title: What do you think of the international investigation that found Russia continued developing the Novichok nerve agent long after the program’s official closure? - Quora

response.answer_text: No proof whatsoever. Too many words like “possible” or “may”, along with various broad generalizations like “specialized in research of cholinesterase inhibitors” (i.e. a broad class of substances). Also, obtaining Russian phone records is a brazenly illegal activity (if not done according to the Russian law and legal procedure), and any results allegedly gained by that should be dismissed right out of the gate as potentially fraudulent, let alone for being “a fruit of the poisonous tree”.
